attributes.action: introduce a means tested benefit for people wanting to run essential local services, (like rural post offices), but who cannot earn a living wage due to overhead charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone bemoans the closure of local services.  A comprehensive and universal postal service is part of what makes us civilised.  Ensuring that local postmasters and postmistresses earn at least the minimum wage would be a relatively cheap way of helping to achieve this.
